attributes.action: agree to the setting up of an English Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 1998 Scotland Act has left England uniquely without its own Parliament or Assembly.  Simple fairness requires that an English Parliament now be created.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "agree to the setting up of an English Parliament."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11854.asp

Prime Minister's Office
